column4: Heya I'm trying to force install Wine 0.9.41 but Synaptic Package manager is denying me the force option.  What would be the reason for this? (It allows me to install the latest and buggiest 0.9.43).
go to the wine site,  in the dl section,  toward the bottom of the page,  there is a link to an archive,  dl the deb.  and commment out he wine repos in synaptic
